name: @ucsantabarbara/ucsb-web-ui-kit
description: Get the ucsb.edu look and feel with CSS and snippets of HTML that will work in your website or web app.

scripts.build: sass src/ucsb.scss:docs/ucsb.css && sass src/ucsb.scss:dist/ucsb.css && sass --style=compressed src/ucsb.scss:dist/ucsb.min.css

author: Gary Scott
